articles.description: Pep Guardiola insists he will come out fighting after Bernardo Silva says Manchester City are in a "dark place” following three successive defeats.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola insists he will fight on as Bernardo Silva says Man City in 'dark place'

articles.description: Xabi Alonso had been the chosen one among Liverpool fans to replace Jurgen Klopp, but Arne Slot has helped them move on with ease.
articles.title: Liverpool boss Arne Slot outshines Bayer Leverkusen's Xabi Alonso at Anfield

articles.description: Real Madrid fell to back-to-back home defeats and their second loss in the Champions League group stage as they were beaten by AC Milan at the Santiago Bernabeu.
articles.title: Real Madrid 1-3 AC Milan: Spaniards fall to second straight home loss

articles.description: Ex-Coventry City forward Viktor Gyokeres scores a hat-trick as Manchester United-bound Ruben Amorim's Sporting thrash Man City 4-1 in the Champions League.
articles.title: Sporting 4-1 Manchester City: Viktor Gyokeres hat-trick as Ruben Amorim's side thrash Man City

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Celtic vs RB Leipzig in the UEFA Champions League.
articles.title: Celtic vs RB Leipzig: UEFA Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers centre Joel Embiid is suspended for three games for pushing a journalist in reaction to a critical column.
articles.title: Joel Embiid: Philadelphia 76ers star suspended for shoving journalist

articles.description: Coco Gauff confirms her semi-final spot at the WTA Finals with a rare win over defending champion Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: WTA Finals: Coco Gauff beats Iga Swiatek to reach semi-finals

articles.description: Six-time Olympic gold medallist Sir Chris Hoy tells BBC Breakfast about his life with terminal cancer and the legacy he hopes to leave.
articles.title: Sir Chris Hoy: British Olympic icon talks to BBC about terminal cancer

articles.description: England name an unchanged starting XV to face Australia in the Autumn Nations Series at Allianz Stadium on Saturday.
articles.title: England v Australia: Hosts name unchanged XV to face Wallabies at Allianz Stadium

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes will not take part in next year's Indian Premier League after opting out of the upcoming auction.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Ben Stokes to miss T20 tournament after opting out of auction
